column8: Preferred Communication Platform_University eLearning Chat Room
column10: 1. When operating new equipment for the first time I prefer to_Have a go and learn by "trial and error"
column11: 1. When operating new equipment for the first time I prefer to_Listen to or ask for an explaination
column12: 1. When operating new equipment for the first time I prefer to_Read the instructions
column13: 2. When seeking travel directions I_Ask for spoken directions
column14: 2. When seeking travel directions I_Follow my nose or maybe use a compass
column15: 2. When seeking travel directions I_Look at a map
column16: 3. When cooking a new dish I_Call a friend for explaination
column17: 3. When cooking a new dish I_Follow a recipe
column18: 3. When cooking a new dish I_Follow my instinct, tasting as I cook
column19: 4. To teach someone something I_Demonstrate and let them have a go
column20: 4. To teach someone something I_Explain verbally
column21: 4. To teach someone something I_Write Instructions
column22: 5. I tend to say_I hear what you are saying
column23: 5. I tend to say_I know how you feel
column24: 5. I tend to say_I see what you mean
column25: 6. I tend to say_Let me try
column28: 7. I tend to say_Listen to me explain
column29: 7. I tend to say_Watch how I do it
column30: 7. I tend to say_You have a go
column31: 8. Complaining about faulty goods I tend to_Go back to the store, or send the faulty item to the head office
column32: 8. Complaining about faulty goods I tend to_Phone
column33: 8. Complaining about faulty goods I tend to_Write a letter
column34: 9. I prefer these leisure activities_Museums or galleries
column35: 9. I prefer these leisure activities_Music or conversation
column36: 9. I prefer these leisure activities_Physical activities or making things
column37: 10. When shopping generally I tend to_Discuss with shop staff
column38: 10. When shopping generally I tend to_Look and decide
column39: 10. When shopping generally I tend to_Try on, handle or test
column40: 11. Choosing a holiday I_Imagine the experience
column41: 11. Choosing a holiday I_Listen to recommendations
column42: 11. Choosing a holiday I_Read the brochures
column43: 12. Choosing a new car I_Discuss with friends
column44: 12. Choosing a new car I_Read the reviews
column45: 12. Choosing a new car I_Test-drive what you fancy
column46: 13. Learning a new skill_I like to give it a try and work it out as I go along by doing it
column47: 13. Learning a new skill_I talk through with the teacher exactly what I am supposed to do
column48: 13. Learning a new skill_I watch what the teacher is doing
column49: 14. Choosing from a restaurant menu_I imagine what  the food will taste like
column50: 14. Choosing from a restaurant menu_I imagine what the food will look like
column51: 14. Choosing from a restaurant menu_I talk through the options in my head
column52: 15. When listening to a band_I listen to the lyrics and the beats
column53: 15. When listening to a band_I move in time with the music
column54: 15. When listening to a band_I sing along to the lyrics (in my head or out loud)
column55: 16. When concentrating I_Discuss the problem and possible solutions in my head
column56: 16. When concentrating I_Focus on the words or pictures in front of me
column57: 16. When concentrating I_Move around a lot, fiddle with pens and pencils and touch unrelated things
column58: 17. I remember things best by_Doing and practicing the activity or imagining it being done
column59: 17. I remember things best by_Saying them aloud or repeating words and key points in my head
column60: 17. I remember things best by_Writing notes or keeping printed details
column61: 18. My first memory is of_Being spoken to
column62: 18. My first memory is of_Doing something
column63: 18. My first memory is of_Looking at something
column64: 19. When anxious I_Can't sit still, fiddle and move around constantly
column65: 19. When anxious I_Talk over in my head what worries me most
column66: 19. When anxious I_Visualize the worst case scenarios
column67: 20. I feel especially connected to others because of_How they look
column68: 20. I feel especially connected to others because of_How they make me
column69: 20. I feel especially connected to others because of_What they say to me
column70: 21. When I revise for an exam, I_I talk over my notes, to myself or to other people
column71: 21. When I revise for an exam, I_Imagine making the movement or creating the formula
column72: 21. When I revise for an exam, I_Write lots of revision notes
column73: 22. When explaining something to someone, I tend to_Encourage them to try and talk them through the idea as they try
column74: 22. When explaining something to someone, I tend to_Explain to them in different ways until they understand
column75: 22. When explaining something to someone, I tend to_Show them what I mean
column76: 23. My main interests are_Listening to music or listening to the radio or talking to friends
column77: 23. My main interests are_Photography or watching films or people watching
column78: 23. My main interests are_Physical/sports activities or fine wines, fine foods or dancing
column79: 24. Most of my free time is spent_Doing physical activity or making things
column80: 24. Most of my free time is spent_Talking to friends
column81: 24. Most of my free time is spent_Watching television
column82: 25. When I first contact a new person_I arrange a face to face meeting
column83: 25. When I first contact a new person_I talk to them on the telephone
column84: 25. When I first contact a new person_I try to get together to share an activity
column85: 26. I first notice how people_Look and dress
column86: 26. I first notice how people_Sound and speak
column87: 26. I first notice how people_Stand and move
column88: 27. If I am very angry_I keep replaying in my mind what it is that has upset me
column89: 27. If I am very angry_I shout lots and tell people how I feel
column90: 27. If I am very angry_I stomp about, slam doors and throw things
column91: 28. I find it easiest to remember_Faces
column92: 28. I find it easiest to remember_Names
column93: 28. I find it easiest to remember_Things I have done
column94: 29. I think I can tell someone is lying because_The vibes I get from them
column95: 29. I think I can tell someone is lying because_Their voice changes
column96: 29. I think I can tell someone is lying because_They avoid looking at you
column97: 30. When I'm meeting with an old friend_I give them a hug or a handshake
column98: 30. When I'm meeting with an old friend_I say "it's great to hear your voice!"
column99: 30. When I'm meeting with an old friend_I say "it's great to see you!"
